channel.title: Comments on: That is Whack
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: will
item.dc:creator: will
item.description:
Hey Drey,
I love venting on blogs. It feels good. This guy seems like he is desperate for some dough is pursuing all possibilities. He can't possibly take it any further since there isn't any paper work dictating he was owed anything. Vent away but he won't get anything and he can't sue you or anything.
Oh, and while I'm here. I promoted House of Whack on Secure Immaturity so I need some advertsing fees. Just saying. No big deal. . .just get back to me.
item.content:encoded:
Hey Drey,

I love venting on blogs. It feels good. This guy seems like he is desperate for some dough is pursuing all possibilities. He can’t possibly take it any further since there isn’t any paper work dictating he was owed anything. Vent away but he won’t get anything and he can’t sue you or anything.

Oh, and while I’m here. I promoted House of Whack on Secure Immaturity so I need some advertsing fees. Just saying. No big deal. . .just get back to me.

item.title: By: E
item.dc:creator: E
item.description:
if I had to guess, I'd say this person was a classic example of "narcissistic personality disorder" but you probably get annoyed with armchair psychologists :)
bleh. I'm sorry you had to deal with that. Some people have never done enough work in life to realize that there is a long, hard road between 'idea' and 'end product' and they think one is of the same value as the other.
item.content:encoded:
if I had to guess, I’d say this person was a classic example of “narcissistic personality disorder” but you probably get annoyed with armchair psychologists ðŸ™‚

bleh. I’m sorry you had to deal with that. Some people have never done enough work in life to realize that there is a long, hard road between ‘idea’ and ‘end product’ and they think one is of the same value as the other.
